text: Santa Cruz de la Palma is a municipality of 15,695 people (2020). It is found on the island of La Palma in the province of Santa Cruz de Tenerife in the Canary Islands in Spain. La Palma has "sister city" status with El Dorado Hills, California. Category:Province of Santa Cruz de Tenerife Category:Municipalities in the Canary Islands
title: Santa Cruz de la Palma
